name: BALLS and EXPLOSIONS!
description:
Created for the GMTK 2020 "Out of Control" Jam

Combining everyone's two favorite things into one package! Move the bouncy ball through the goal using nothing but an explosive force, dodging traps and death along the way!

Only 15 levels by the way. The last few get pretty hard and will take a little while to beat, if you feel like trying to beat them. Every level is beatable.

How to play:

1. Left click with the mouse to create explosions that move the bouncy ball through the level. Get to the goal to move on

2. Dodge the spikes

3. Use buttons to open up some areas

Short and simple. Let me know what you think of it. Thanks for checking it out!

Created with Unity
